name: com.zenvin.settings-framework
description: Made to allow for simple implementation of arbitrarily typed game settings.

samples.description: A complete demonstration of how a settings menu could be set up with this package.

An implementation of a dropdown setting, specifically for changing the localization of the game.
REQUIRES UNITY'S LOCALIZATION PACKAGE!

An implementation of a Slider for changing volumes. 
Includes property drawer for picking an exposed AudioMixer parameter and takes logarithmic scaling into account when setting values.

An implementation of a Slider for changing volumes in FMOD projects. 
REQUIRES THE FMOD ASSET TO BE PRESENT IN THE PROJECT. 
Learn more: 
https://fmod.com/unity 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/fmod-for-unity-161631

An implementation of a Setting for remapping a key binding. 
REQUIRES THE PROJECT TO BE USING THE NEW INPUT SYSTEM. 
Learn more: 
https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.inputsystem@1.10/manual/index.html
